On the official Google blog Eric Schmidt wrote that he, Page and co-founder Sergey Brin had decided it was time to make some structural changes to the company. This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, wrote Eric Schmidt . He further discussed their roles, saying that Page would lead product development and technology strategy along with becoming the company's CEO.
